page.title: 12VILLAGE CHILDREN
page.content: {Ryton First School}is very small. It is situated well away from main roads. The Head, Miss Smith, is helped by 3 staff. The school is closely linked with the church. Most of the children live in the village. The children were very polite. and keen to help with the Survey. The children start at the school when they are 4 or 5, and leave when they are 8 or 9. Older children leave the village in a special bus to go to the local{Middle School}at Wolston. The children play in the{village park or in their{own gardens}in their free time, a few play in the{estate roads. Some are taken to the{"Conexion"}(a club) on Saturdays where there are sports facilities.{Visiting relatives and{watching T.V.}are important{free {time activities.
